newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Wang On increases convertible notes.
newsitem.headline: Wang On increases convertible notes.

text.p: Wang On Group Ltd said on Monday it has issued another HK$16 million of convertible notes to cover over allotment, bringing the total amount of the notes to HK$66 million.
Sun Hung Kai International Ltd, the placing manager of the issue, had exercised its option to request the company to issue additional notes due to oversubsctiption, the company said.
The number of new shares to be issued upon completion of the notes will represent about 19.42 percent of its existing issued share capital, it added.
The decoration and construction services concern earlier said proceeds from the issue would be used to finance its future expansion and investment plans and for working capital.
